You plan to visit 6 European cities for 17 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 5 days in Barcelona. You plan to stay in Mykonos for 3 days. You want to spend 3 days in Athens. You want to spend 4 days in Bucharest. You want to spend 2 days in Edinburgh. You want to meet a friend in Edinburgh between day 5 and day 6. You want to spend 5 days in Brussels. From day 1 to day 5, there is a annual show you want to attend in Brussels.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Brussels and Athens, Edinburgh and Barcelona, Bucharest and Athens, Brussels and Bucharest, Edinburgh and Athens, Brussels and Edinburgh, Barcelona and Athens, Barcelona and Bucharest, Athens and Mykonos, Brussels and Barcelona.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 17 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
